concept.description: On a journey to bring heritage to meet the contemporary spirit. Old flavors are recreated, in the form of the current era.
map.title: Direction
meta_title: No Bar Dalat - Vietnamese Identity Intact
meta_description: No Bar Dalat - A modern cocktail bar & pub in Da Lat where Vietnamese heritage meets contemporary spirit. Enjoy unique cocktails, absinthe, and wine in a nostalgic atmosphere.
meta_keywords: nobar, no bar, nobar dalat, cocktail bar dalat, da lat bar, bars in da lat, pub dalat, wine bar near me, absinthe, bar đà lạt, Vietnamese, quiet bar, night life

match.eula.text: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. I understand that I am responsible for my own safety and interactions.
match.eula.alert: Please agree to the EULA to continue.
match.eula.content.1: 1. Acceptance of Terms: By using the "Find a Drinking Buddy" feature ("Service") provided by No Bar Dalat, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.
match.eula.content.2: 2. User Responsibility: You acknowledge that you are solely responsible for your interactions with other users. No Bar Dalat does not conduct criminal background checks on its users. You agree to take all necessary precautions in all interactions with other users, particularly if you decide to meet offline or in person.
match.eula.content.3: 3. Safety Disclaimer: No Bar Dalat is not responsible for the conduct of any user on or off of the Service. You agree to use caution in all interactions with other users, particularly if you decide to communicate off the Service or meet in person.
match.eula.content.4: 4. Prohibited Conduct: You agree not to use the Service for any unlawful purpose or to harass, abuse, or harm another person. We reserve the right to terminate your access to the Service if you violate these terms.
match.eula.content.5: 5. Privacy: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. We collect minimal information necessary to provide the Service (Name, Email, Languages) and do not share it with third parties without your consent.
match.eula.content.6: 6. No Liability: In no event shall No Bar Dalat be liable for any damages whatsoever, whether direct, indirect, general, special, compensatory, consequential, and/or incidental, arising out of or relating to the conduct of you or anyone else in connection with the use of the Service.
